sources.description:
Mild-mannered Chris Cross (Edward G. Robinson) paints himself into a corner when femme fatale Kitty March (Joan Bennett) and her slick accomplice Johnny Prince (Dan Duryea) spin his artistic dreams into a web of cash and deception. As Chris‚Äôs brushstrokes turn desperate, this canvas of con-artistry cracks‚Äîleaving Johnny framed and Chris haunted by a masterpiece gone rotten!
